name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LISA AI | AI for sales lead generation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip generic sales outreach. Craft personalized emails with dos/don'ts for interaction & content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI powered LinkedIn tool for cold outreach emails. You can unlock email IDs, create personalized messages, and get personality insights. With this AI for Sales tool, Increase your lead generation, response rates, and sales conversions. Use personality insights to convert cold calls.

Get FREE $5 credits and access to all features on signing up.

LISA AI is an autonomous sales agent which helps you in the following:

[1] Unlock email IDs: With the click of a button, unlock email ids of your prospects and supercharge your outreach targets.

[2] Hyper-Personalized Email Crafting: Utilizing the context about the prospect, including their personality and behavioral insights, LISA crafts emails that are highly personalized and far more likely to engage the recipient effectively, increasing the chances of conversion significantly.

[3] Unlock personality insights: LISA uses psychological frameworks such as empathy maps, DISC, OCEAN to analyze your prospect and gives you useful insights which will help you decide on how to interact with them. Use this feature to be better prepared for a meeting and lead to higher conversions.

Use LISA AI to increase your leads, reduce your time on outreach messages and increase your conversions.
